abstract: The attorney general of New York, Andrew M. Cuomo, said Citigroup misled investors about the dangers of auction-rate securities and destroyed evidence that his office had requested.
snippet: The attorney general of New York, Andrew M. Cuomo, said Citigroup misled investors about the dangers of auction-rate securities and destroyed evidence that his office had requested.
lead_paragraph: The attorney general of New York, Andrew M. Cuomo, said on Friday that he would take legal action against Citigroup, which he said misled investors about the dangers of auction-rate securities and destroyed evidence that his office had requested as part of its investigation into the company’s sales practices.

headline.main: New York to File Charges Against Citigroup Over Securities
headline.print_headline: New York to File Charges Against Citigroup Over Securities
